headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID

parameters.name: material_type
parameters.description: Material type. Enum values: VIDEO , IMAGE , INSTANT_PAGE .

parameters.name: lifetime
parameters.description: Use to specify whether to query all data. If so, you do not need to specify start_date and end_date . The default value is: False .

parameters.name: start_date Conditional
parameters.description: Start time, closed interval. Format such as: 2020-01-01 (advertiser time zone). This is mandatory when lifetime is set to false .

parameters.name: end_date Conditional
parameters.description: End time, closed interval. Format such as: 2020-01-01 (advertiser time zone). This is mandatory when lifetime is set to false .

parameters.name: info_fields
parameters.description: Information you want to get about creatives. The default value is [ material_id , video_id , image_id , page_id ]. Allowed values: All data fields that are shown under info in the response.

parameters.name: metrics_fields
parameters.description: The metrics or dimension data that you need. The default value is: [ impressions , spend ]. Value range: all fields under metrics in the response.

parameters.name: filtering
parameters.description: Filtering criteria

parameters.name: material_id
parameters.description: Material ID. You can specify at most 10 material IDs to filter the results for.

parameters.name: material_name
parameters.description: Material name. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: ad_name
parameters.description: The ad name. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: ad_id
parameters.description: A list of ad IDs you want to filter by. Bulk query is supported.

parameters.name: adgroup_name
parameters.description: The ad group name that you want to filter by. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: adgroup_id
parameters.description: The list of ad groups that you want to filter by. Bulk query is supported

parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: The name of the campaign that you want to filter by. Fuzzy search is supported

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The list of campaigns that you want to filter by. Bulk query is supported.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: List of location codes that you want to filter by. For enum values, see Appendix - Location code

parameters.name: placement
parameters.description: List of ad placements that you want to filter by. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement

parameters.name: page_id
parameters.description: Instant page IDs

parameters.name: page_status
parameters.description: Instant page status. Enum values: DRAFT , READY

parameters.name: page_biz_type
parameters.description: Instant page business type. Enum values: CUSTOM , APP_PROFILE , INSTANT_FORM

parameters.name: page_template_type
parameters.description: Instant page template type. When page_biz_type includes CUSTOM , the allowed values are CUSTOMIZED INTRODUCTION BRAND_SAFETY SALES_PRODUCT MOVIE_TRAILER When page_biz_type includes INSTANT_FORM , the enum values are NORMAL_FORM and ADVANCED_FORM .

parameters.name: app_profile_country
parameters.description: Codes of the country or location that the instant page is deployed to. Valid when instant_page_biz_type includes APP_PROFILE .

parameters.name: app_profile_external_app_id
parameters.description: ID of the app that the instant page directs to. Valid when instant_page_biz_type includes APP_PROFILE

parameters.name: customized_page_external_action
parameters.description: Conversion events that are specific to tiktok instant pages. The enumeration values are found in: Appendix - Conversion events .

parameters.name: spend
parameters.description: Total Cost Range

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: Minimum value, open interval. Not filling means there is no minimum.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: Maximum value, open interval. "No" means no limit to the maximum value.

parameters.name: conversion
parameters.description: The conversion value

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: The minimum value. open interval. If not specified, there is no limit on the minimum value.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: The maximum value. Open interval. If not specified, there is no limit on the maximum value.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Field to sort by. Support sorting according to the creation time of the material and all the index data. Not sorted by default.

parameters.name: sort_type
parameters.description: Sorting order. Enum values: ASC , DESC . Default value: DESC .

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current number of pages. Default value: 1, range: â‰¥ 1

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10, range: 1-1000

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: list
fields.description: Report information

fields.name: info
fields.description: Material information

fields.name: material_id
fields.description: Material ID

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Video ID

fields.name: image_id
fields.description: Image ID

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source of material. For enum values, see Enumeration - Material Source .

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: Country or location code. For enum values, see Appendix - Location code

fields.name: placement
fields.description: Placement. For enum values, see Enumeration - Placement

fields.name: num_ads
fields.description: The number of ads.

fields.name: total_active_days
fields.description: The total active days. An active day is a day that has spending ( spend > 0). This field only supports VIDEO type of material.

fields.name: related_ad_ids
fields.description: The IDs of the related ads. This field only supports VIDEO type of material.

fields.name: adgroup_number
fields.description: The number of related ad groups. This field only supports VIDEO type of material.

fields.name: related_adgroup_ids
fields.description: The IDs of the related ad groups. This field only supports VIDEO type of material.

fields.name: page_id
fields.description: Instant page ID

fields.name: page_status
fields.description: Instant page status. Enum values: DRAFT , READY

fields.name: page_biz_type
fields.description: Instant page business type. Enum values: CUSTOM , APP_PROFILE , INSTANT_FORM

fields.name: page_template_type
fields.description: Instant page template type. When page_biz_type includes CUSTOM , the allowed values are CUSTOMIZED INTRODUCTION BRAND_SAFETY SALES_PRODUCT MOVIE_TRAILER When page_biz_type includes INSTANT_FORM , the allowed values are NORMAL_FORM and ADVANCED_FORM .

fields.name: page_thumbnail
fields.description: Link to the page thumbnail

fields.name: app_profile_country
fields.description: Codes of the countries or locations that the instant page is deployed to. Valid when instant_page_biz_type includes APP_PROFILE .

fields.name: app_profile_external_app_id
fields.description: ID of the app that the instant page directs to. Valid when instant_page_biz_type includes APP_PROFILE

fields.name: app_profile_icon
fields.description: App icon

fields.name: customized_page_external_action
fields.description: Conversion events that are specific to customized instant pages

fields.name: metrics
fields.description: Metrics data. Please see the Metrics table for details.

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Paging information

fields.name: page
fields.description: current page number

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Paging Size

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total number

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
